episodes.title: The Disturbing Reality of Religious Tax Exemptions
episodes.description:
In this explosive interview, researcher Jason Polychron reveals how the 1989 Hernandez v. Commissioner ruling should have made tithing and temple dues non-deductible across all religions—but the IRS covered it up. Scientology used this legal oversight to force the IRS into granting it tax-exempt status in 1993—not through harassment as the mainstream story claims, but by exposing a legal inconsistency that threatened to unravel the entire religious tax-exempt system.

Join my book club, The Forbidden Book Society, where we break down the books no one else will touch.
https://app.minnect.com/circles/6d130fec-a977-4496-82bd-5ed7f7dd425c
